problem_summary_simple: Find a person who trusts no one but is trusted by everyone else.
problem_summary_technical: Identify a node with an in-degree of N-1 and an out-degree of 0 in a directed graph.
key_insights: The town judge must have an out-degree of 0 (trusts nobody).
The town judge must have an in-degree of N-1 (trusted by everyone else).
A single pass to calculate degrees and another to check the condition is efficient.
